item.title: Doctor charged with sex assaults of 38 patients
item.description: Nathaniel Spencer of Birmingham is accused of sexually assaulting 38 patients, including a child.

item.title: Germany votes to bring back voluntary military service programme for 18-year-olds
item.description: The shift in its approach to its military follows a push to create Europe's strongest conventional army.

item.title: US hits out at EU for fining Elon Musk's X
item.description: The European Commission says the social media site is opening its users up to scams and impersonations.

item.title: Reeves will not face ethics probe over pre-Budget remarks
item.description: The chancellor has been accused of painting an overly-negative picture of the economy to justify tax rises.

item.title: Government pledges to end children living in B&Bs
item.description: The strategy also includes making childcare more accessible for families on Universal Credit.
